creditline: Gift of Mrs. Christian H. Aall in memory of her grandparents Mr. and Mrs. M. J. Scanlon
description: Chinese Export; porcelain with underglaze blue enamels, traces of gilding
text: Chinese porcelain painters copied this floral decoration from an illustration by Dutch botanist Maria Sybilla Merian (1647-1717).  This blue-and-white version was originally gilded.  A multicolored example is on view in the Doris and Leo Hodroff Gallery (G209) on the museum's second floor.
title: Plate
